content: **crocheted blanket with granny squares in drops karisma ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no u-893 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** the piece measures approx width = 102 cm = 40 length = 142 cm = 55 3/4 1 square measures approx 20 x 20 cm = 8 x 8 **materials** drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 350 g color 05 black 100 g color 01 off white 100 g color 11 orange 100 g color 33 medium pink 100 g color 39 dark old rose 100 g color 50 sea green 100 g color 52 dark mustard 100 g color 69 light grey green 50 g color 07 bright blue 50 g color 18 red 50 g color 30 light denim blue 50 g color 45 light olive 50 g color 55 light beige brown 50 g color 65 denim blue 50 g color 79 lemon if you wish to work the blanket in only one color you will need 1000 g drops karisma **crochet gauge ** 16 double crochets in width and 8 row in height = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 1 square should measure approx 20 x 20 cm = 8 x 8 crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm = us 7 hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a smaller hook size
